welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kirkkonummi, Finland! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this coastal town, known for its stunning nature, rich history, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Kirkkonummi has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'HEL Airport Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
